name: Pertussis - A Short Educational Game Made for a School Project
name_original: Pertussis - A Short Educational Game Made for a School Project
description:
Pertussis is an RPG that leads the player through a tragic story that can be made less tragic with their help. By spreading awareness, the player is able to help their town prevent what could be a serious outbreak of pertussis.

Find the correct sequences of facts during conversation battles to help your neighbors see the dangers of pertussis. The neighbors will give the player subtle clues in their dialogue that hint towards what facts may being able to convince them that pertussis is a serious problem. Regardless of the players success, they will walk away with newfound knowledge of pertussis and a better understanding of its dangers.
